page.title: 20ATTITUDES
page.content: The people of {Lanark}are concerned about many issues affecting their lives to a greater or lesser degree.One issue,which has caused much debate is the question of a new{Road} through the centre of the town.Some planners and some of the landowners want this ,but the inhabitants are against it.Another source of lively debate has been whether the {District {Council }should rewire the Memorial Hall in{Lanark} rather than other smaller halls as it is used for a great deal of functions.Another hotly debate subject is the question of the Coop Building,which has lain derilict for years and is an eye sore.Also people in {Lanark }are angry about the {Strathclyde Region's }decision to take away a class room at the Lanark Primary School without thinking about the consequences of such a move.
